itemDescription: British entomologist, ornithologist, and naturalist who studied the fauna of the islands of Hawaii and Hymenoptera (1866-1955)

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Cyril Layton Perkins FRS (15 November 1866 – 29 September 1955) was a distinguished British entomologist, ornithologist, and naturalist noted for his work on the fauna of the islands of Hawaii and on Hymenoptera. He is not to be confused with his son John Frederick Perkins, also a hymenopterist.
